participant_1.background:
I am the only member of my immediate family who is not employed by Sears.
I have a crib in my office, so I can keep an eye on my child while I work.
I have an old laptop that I use to read sci-fi space adventures.
both my parents were over 6 foot tall.
I'm not always the most graceful person, and I've had my fair share of bike crashes and nail polish disasters.

participant_2.background:
I'm often a bit of a klutz, but I'm always trying to improve my coordination.
Every Sunday, I sing in the choir and then go for a drive to clear my mind.
my favorite subject in school was science.
I grow my own potatoes and experiment with new seasonings.
My family are avid cyclists as well

content.text: I'm not always the most graceful person, and I've had my fair share of bike crashes and nail polish disasters.
I'm often a bit of a klutz, but I'm always trying to improve my coordination.
Same! I'm working on my biking skills by starting off on smaller hills and roads.
That's a great idea! I've been cycling for a while now and I'm still learning new things all the time.
I've been growing my own potatoes this year, and I've been experimenting with different seasonings.
That's awesome! I love growing my own food. I've been growing my own tomatoes and peppers this year.
My favorite subject in school was science, and I sing in the choir every Sunday.
I love science too! I used to be in the choir in high school, but I don't sing anymore.
That's a shame! Singing is so much fun.
Yeah, it is. I miss it sometimes.
